alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 1:34AM MST until December 03 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO 10 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest wind gusts up to 60 mph expected Saturday afternoon and night, with decreasing winds late Saturday night and Sunday. For the second Wind Advisory, southwest wind gusts up to 65 mph expected Sunday night into Monday morning. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Livingston Area. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 4 AM MST Sunday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 PM Sunday to 10 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills. Mild and dry conditions could cause quick fire spread. Use caution with any burning activities.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.
